questions.question_text:
A client completes multiple customer journeys that include email tiles. Now, the client wants to implement flow control on future customer journeys to improve open rates and optimize delivery.

What are two accurate statements about the Smart Scheduler feature? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

choices.C: Auto Scheduler enables customer journeys to schedule message deliveries to each individual contact automatically, based on the last time an email was opened as calculated by the AI for that contact.
choices.A: A Scheduler tile must be used in front of each action segment, which allows you to set the options for Smart Scheduling
choices.D: The Smart Scheduler feature can be enabled inside an outbound journey's email tile.
choices.B: Auto Scheduler enables customer journeys to schedule message deliveries to each individual contact automatically, based on the best time to email as calculated by the AI for that contact.

choices.A: Updating a token only applies to the current message and future messages.
choices.B: Removing a token will impact messages that are currently using it. The original placeholder will be removed from the text box.
choices.D: Removing a token only removes it from the pre-defined list; messages already using the token will continue to use the token.
choices.C: Updating a token will also update the dynamic text in existing messages that use it.

questions.question_text:
Your marketing department will be creating multiple email messages to be used in several customer journeys.
To prepare for this, you need to create content settings to determine the dynamic values to be used.
What is the maximum number of Content Settings that can be set as default for multiple customer journeys?

discussion.content: I think this is a straight forward 1! :)
Only 1 content setting record can be associated with a journey.
